name: Professional Lumberjack 2015
description: Face the hard work of real lumberjacks as you control and operate various small and large machinery at your disposal. From huge Feller Buncher and Harvesters that debranch and cut up the trunks, to tractors, cranes, trucks and trailers for the transportation of the chopped logs.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo / AMD Athlon X2 Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTS 450 /  AMD Radeon HD 5750 with 512MB VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad / AMD Phenom X4 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 560 / AMD Radeon HD 6870 with 1GB VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space

reviews.review_text: Originally bought as a joke by my friends, I decided to download the game and give it a try for the laughs. What I found was nothing short of astonishing. The games runs at a beautiful 4FPS. The graphics blew me away with the light rays touching gracing my eyes like the glory of God himself. My truck clipped and became stuck on everything, just like real life.When I finally arrived at the woodmill to begin my day of work, I found thie gameplay to pump my adrenaline in a way that I haven't felt since the glory days of PS2 gaming.I watched as the simple gameplay produced the most beautiful tree cutting animations I have ever seen. I've cut trees down before, but nothing this astounding.  This game is simply a must play. Don't look at the price, because it doesn't matter, because it is worth it.  10/10 Best game.

If you like Farming Simulator 15's tree cutting... don't buy this, run back to it as fast as you can.  The physics are from 2001, tree cutting is automated (you just drive to a spot and press Right Click when it tells you).  Let me save you some money and don't buy it :)
wouldnt be a bad game if the physics were alot better. vehicle response isn't very good and not very detailed compared to the map. was very disappointed
